医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
患有大麻使用障碍的加拿大成年人患心血管疾病的风险似乎高出 60%一项新研究发现，患有大麻使用障碍的加拿大成年人首次心脏病发作、中风或其他主要心血管事件的风险似乎比没有大麻使用障碍的人高出约 60%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Canadian-adults-with-cannabis-use-disorder-appear-to-have-6025-higher-risk-of-cardioangio-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Canadian-adults-with-cannabis-use-disorder-appear-to-have-6025-higher-risk-of-cardioangio-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e351cce1-82a1-49c2-9639-eb1f70fc7c44 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 11:57:46 -0400 Canadian adults with cannabis use disorder appear to have 60% higher risk of cardiovascular diseases
新计划帮助幼儿培养自我控制和健康饮食习惯终身健康和幸福的两个最佳预测因素是幼儿期的自我控制技能和健康的饮食习惯。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/New-program-helps-toddlers-develop-self-control-and-healthy-eating-habits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/New-program-helps-toddlers-develop-self-control-and-healthy-eating-habits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66083341-c7f8-410a-9ce9-235dab1cfd3b Thu, 28 Sep 2023 10:54:33 -0400 New program helps toddlers develop self-control and healthy eating habits
天然抗生素硫链丝菌素为炎症性肠病治疗带来新希望研究人员通过检查硫链丝菌素对结肠炎症的影响并通过各种生化方法确定其靶标，探索了硫链丝菌肽对实验性结肠炎的治疗作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Natural-antibiotic-thiostrepton-reveals-new-hope-for-炎症-bowel-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Natural-antibiotic-thiostrepton-reveals-new-hope-for-炎症-bowel-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bcda03b2-077c-4206-b1b7-05151a7a6472 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 10:40:00 -0400 Natural antibiotic thiostrepton reveals new hope for inflammatory bowel disease treatment
母亲在怀孕期间的社会心理压力与孩子的睡眠存在负相关研究表明，母亲在怀孕期间的社会心理压力与孩子的睡眠存在负面关联，这种关联会持续到整个童年时期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Mothers-psychosocial-stress-during-pregnancy-has-negative-associations-with-childrens-sleep.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Mothers-psychosocial-stress-during-pregnancy-has-negative-associations-with-childrens-sleep.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b4c4fe8-1f69-4c03-a8b0-98db9347cbc8 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 10:25:42 -0400 Mothers' psychosocial stress during pregnancy has negative associations with children's sleep
虚拟现实与阿片类药物：烧伤创面护理期间非药物疼痛管理的临床试验研究人员评估了虚拟现实作为一种非药物干预措施的可行性和有效性，与标准的基于阿片类药物的方法相比，用于管理成人烧伤患者在换药期间的程序性疼痛。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Virtual-reality-vs-opioids-clinical-trial-of-non-pharmacological-pain-management-during-burn-wound-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230928/Virtual-reality-vs-opioids-clinical-trial-of-non-pharmacological-pain-management-during-burn-wound-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd9c6693-d72b-4dd9-aa8e-e7927cc08205 Thu, 28 Sep 2023 09:31:00 -0400 Virtual reality vs. opioids: clinical trial of non-pharmacological pain management during burn wound care
